Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1817 WEST 4TH STREET, TEMPE, Arizona, 85281, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Wrap Technologies Inc offers public safety technologies and services. The firm develops policing solutions to law enforcement and security personnel. Its BolaWRAP 150 Remote Restraint device is a patented hand-held tool that discharges a Kevlar cord to restrain noncompliant individuals from a range of 10-25 feet. The group operates in the Americas Europe the Middle East Africa and the Asia Pacific.
